websites.title: Custom website creation
websites.subtitle: I create websites that inspire trust and convert your visitors into customers.

description.unique: Each project is unique: I adapt to your identity, your goals and your budget.
description.mockup: With or without mockup: I can work from your designs or create them with a partner designer.

examples.showcase: - Showcase site for your activity or business.

collaboration.title: Front-end collaboration
collaboration.subtitle: I integrate your staff to build or evolve your web project.

description.join: I join your teams as a freelancer to ensure the quality and continuity of your development.
description.adapt: I adapt to your tools, processes and work pace.

examples.short_long: - Short or long mission in direct collaboration with your staff.
examples.integration: - Integration or redesign of existing interfaces.
examples.design: - Implementation or evolution of a design system.

maintenance.title: Maintenance & support
maintenance.subtitle: I take care of the maintenance of your site so that it remains efficient and secure.

description.preventive: Preventive and corrective maintenance of your website.
